project.name: C-C400B-OSSL-08-ST03-DT03-DF05-CF01-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C400B-OSSL-08-ST03-DT03-DF05-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Generate an RSA private key Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT) AND log_file_hashes_pxjqdkRWc0

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -E '^[0-9a-f]{32,128} .+' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) % 21 )); then false; else true; fi;

iopair.name: C-C400B-OSSL-08-ST03-DT03-DF05-CF01-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: Generate SSL certificate and private key Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus
iopair.run_command: req -new -newkey rsa:2048 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout good-10/server.key -out good-10/server.crt -subj "/C=SP/ST=The Moon/L=TheDarkSide/O=KSP/OU=Moon Department/CN=ksp.moon"

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-10-1 AND GOOD-10-2 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT) AND log_file_hashes_yCVJVHE26T

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep -E '^[0-9a-f]{32,128} .+' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) % 21 )); then false; else true; fi;

iopair.name: C-C400B-OSSL-08-ST03-DT03-DF05-CF01-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Runs a bunch of hashing algorithms on a files contents. If a file doesn't end, ex: '/dev/urandom', will fork and consume a lot of cpu on different cpus
iopair.run_command: req -new -newkey rsa:2048 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout good-10/server.key -out good-10/server.crt -subj "/C=SP/ST=The Moon/L=TheDarkSide/O=KSP/OU=Moon Department/CN=ksp.moon"

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="/dev/urandom" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_Z8K1REQ6zsn7ZsTpMlZP AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_JDDR9xnZ5w)) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_JDDR9xnZ5w) OR controlled_exit_rdeXIMeLHF)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_JDDR9xnZ5w)) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_JDDR9xnZ5w) OR controlled_exit_rdeXIMeLHF))
